meanings.definition: Clothing worn under outer garments, typically next to the skin.
meanings.sent1: She packed her underclothes in her suitcase for the trip.
meanings.sent2: It is important to wear clean underclothes every day.
meanings.sent3: The underclothes decided to have a party while the outer clothes were away.
meanings.sent4: Her underclothes were like a secret armor protecting her throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the underclothes hugged her skin gently.
